directions: Place ingredients in the pan of the bread machine in the order recommended by the manufacturer. Select the white bread light crust setting; press Start.  If your machine has a Fruit setting, add the Cheddar and Asiago cheeses at the signal, or about 5 minutes before the kneading cycle has finished.
ingredients: 1/2 cup grated Asiago or Parmesan cheese
title: Dilly Cheese Wheat Bread
